def.dt: :extremely important Vitamins are crucial for maintaining good health. Eggs are a crucial [=essential] ingredient in this recipe. a crucial distinction/difference It's crucial that we arrive before 8 o'clock. Teachers are crucial to the success of the school. She played a crucial role in the meeting. Tonight's game is the crucial [=decisive] game of the series. [=whoever wins this game will win the series] a crucial decision
